name: Zombie Shooter: Dead Of Night
description:
Waking in the dead room, face to face with hundreds of bloodthirsty zombies, you are really stuck in hell!
This’s not a nightmare, keep calm and do not despair!
You’re a legend, you’re a death shooter. The powerful weapons in your hand, let the dead target die again!

FEATURES
• Realistic 3D graphics
• Visual and Special Effects
• First Person Shooter Game
• 6 powerful weapons with 10 level
• Hundreds of missions
